StuffTheSpire:PointBlankPower.NAME: Point Blank
DESCRIPTIONS: Attacks that Deal damage to all enemies deal #b50% percent more #ydamage if only #b1 enemy is in the room.

StuffTheSpire:DarkFadePower.NAME: Dark Fade
DESCRIPTIONS: While active, #b75% of all damage taken by enemies, including damage from this power is dealt to the enemy at the start of the next turn.
